column1: Imad starts off with his trademark inducker, picked off the pads to short fine leg
tossed up and drifting into the pads, glanced straight to short fine leg
fuller and sliding into middle, worked away to short midwicket off the front foot
back of a length and skidding into a back-foot punch down to long-on
fuller and angling across off, scythed off the front foot to extra-cover, the fielder gets a hand to it, but the ball still scurries away to the fence
darted short and outside off, forced off the back foot to cover-point

shortish and holds its line outside off, comes off slow off the pitch, lashed through extra-cover, the fielder chases hard, slides at the edge of the boundary, but he is in contact with the ball while doing so. That's a four
shorter and outside off, Danushka throws his bat at the ball and sends a thick outside edge flying past first slip's left
shorter and outside off, cracked up to extra-cover
shortish on off, forced off the back foot to extra-cover
slower offcutter, dinked down to deep third man
Amir digs it short on middle, run away with an open face to point
full and sliding across off, tapped away to cover
Imad has Danushka nicking off! Flatter and sliding across off from around the wicket, a crease-bound Danushka slashes and edges it behind to Sarfaraz
tossed up on middle, played back to the bowler
skids across off once again, short and wide, slashes and does not connect
pushed through flatter on leg stump, whipped off the back foot to deep square leg
Avishka pushes an incoming ball down to long-on
shorter and outside off, gets on top of the bounce and laces it away to the left of extra-cover
good length on middle, presses forward and dabs it back to the bowler
short and fizzes back in at 141.5ks, beats him on the inside edge as he aims to chop it down to third man
short and on the hips, Rajapaksa glances it away to short fine leg, where Hasnain fumbles and gives away a four
short and thumps the pad, there's a mix-up between the wickets. Avishka strays out of the crease, the bowler tracks the ball down, spins around, but can't throw the stumps down
149ks short and wide outside off, Rajapaksa creates additional room and smears it over extra-cover. Hit flat and hard to the fence
shot, Avishka! Dangled up slower and outside off, Avishka leaves his crease and hoists it straight of mid-off. Nice and clean
short and speared on middle, he camps back and punches down to long-on
Rajapaksa launches it over midwicket! Pushed across off stump, he drops down to one knee and smokes a slog-sweep
shorter and breaks back in, Rajapaksa makes some room and chops it in front of square on the off side
arm ball from Imad, stabbed back to the bowler off the back foot

Direct hit (from Shadab, who else?) Another arm ball, jabbed away to the right of midwicket. Shadab runs in, swoops down on the ball, and nails the stumps at the non-striker's end to catch Avishka well short. Such a swift pick-up and throw from Shadab
Jayasuriya stands tall to a short ball outside off and crunches it away through cover-point. First-ball four for Jayasuriya
nice and full, slanting in on middle, defended off the back foot

Babar can't effect a direct hit and reprieves Rajapaksa. Full on middle, nurdled to mid-on. There's an awful mix-up between the wickets, Rajaspaksa wants a single, but Jayasuriya sends him back. Babar can't under-arm flick it onto the stumps
Jayasuriya closes his face and leading-edges it back towards the bowler's right
slower one, forced to mid-off. Wahab can't throw the stumps now this time. A direct hit could have put Jayasuriya in trouble
Shades of Sanath Jayasuriya in this regal loft. On a length and outside off, Rajapaksa hits through the line, lifts it over mid-off for six
dangled up on the pads, whipped with the wrists to deep midwicket
tossed and turns into middle and leg, clipped in front of square and the hare across for the second
very full on middle and leg, forced down to long-on
similar slider, hit down to long-on once again
full and angling across off, opens the face and quietly guides the ball to point
swept from the stumps to short fine leg, where Hasnain fumbles again and concedes a single this time
back of a length and angling in from round the wicket, 146.2ks, tip and run to cover
short and angling into the chest at 141ks, fended off to the leg side
short and angling into the pads, tickled away really fine, the man in the deep is squarer
short and shoved down leg, 146.4ks, but Hasnain needs to re-set his radar
short and slanting into off, the ball hits the bat as opposed to bat hitting ball. Spliced to cover
Hasnain hits a hard length on middle and attacks the stumps, punched down the ground for one
short and angling into the hips, glanced away to deep square leg
straighter one on middle, driven down to long-off
slider from Shadab, pitches outside leg, defeats the sweep and hits the pad
pushed through flatter and quicker outside off, drags a slog-sweep to long-on
good length and angling across off, Jayasuriya plays at the last moment, opens the face, and dinks it away fine of short third man for four
Jayasuriya jumps across off and clips this with the break through midwicket
Rajapaksa backs a long way outside off, slashes and misses outside off. Sarfaraz can't gather the ball cleanly
short and outside off, ramped down to third man
short, pings the body and rolls away behind square on the leg side
dug in short on off, 144ks, fended back to the bowler
very full on middle, poked down to deep third man
length ball on off, skews a loft down the ground to long-on as the bat turns in his hands
rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and glides behind point. To get it behind Shadab and beat him is some feat
short of length and pulled over deep midwicket, clears the fielder easily for a 78-metre six
but the result is same, fuller around off and a slog sweep this time from Rajapaksa, an even bigger six over deep square leg
flatter and wide outside off, looks to cut but is beaten
short of length outside off, dabs it towards short third man
fuller and wide outside off, smashes it behind point, four more
length around off but spinning down the leg side, needs to be bowled again
length around off, tucked away towards short midwicket
length ball around off, dabs it towards backward point for a quick single, 100 comes up for Sri Lanka
short of length outside off, opens the face to run it towards third man
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg, just three singles so far
a full toss on the pads but Rajapaksa fails to put it away, misses to get enough on that flick, a brace to square leg
fifty for Rajapaksa. A slower one, short outside off, Rajapaksa had to adjust, opens the face in the end to guide it towards third man
length outside off, waits for it but steering this towards third man
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
fuller around off, looks to scoop but misses, hits the keeper's pad and they run a bye
fuller on the stumps, 95.7kph, drags it towards midwicket
fired an outside off, looks to hit it through covers off the back foot, misses
a low full toss on the pads, chips it towards midwicket for a couple
length ball outside off, drifting away from the batsman who looks to slap it through covers but misses
short of length outside off, stays back and slashes it past point, beats the diving Shadab on his left
length ball at the stumps, opens the face of the bat to tap it towards third man
length outside off, backs away to hit through covers, misses
fuller around off, 143.9kph, Rajapaksa gives himself a bit of room and lofts it over extra cover for a six

banged in short this time, Rajapaksa moves further away and goes over sweeper cover this time, the fielder thought he had a chance, positioned himself, jumped with an outstretched right hand but the ball just evades him
length ball but no room this time, Rajapaksa skips down and looks to hit it over the bowler's head, no connection
starts with a slower length ball around off, Jayasuriya adjusts well and dabs it square on the off side
a slower one, short outside off, pulled towards deep midwicket, a wayward throw by Asif Ali, else Rajapaksa could have been in trouble
in the blockhole this time, jams his bat at it
follows the batsman with another bowler, Rajapaksa was moving towards the leg stump and fails to get bat on it
short of length, Rajapaksa charges down and pulls it to the left of deep midwicket, moves to 70 with that boundary
follows the batsman with another yorker, Rajapaska was once again looking to create room, the ball hits the bottom of the bat and goes on to hit the pads
slower one down the leg side, looks to flick but misses, to the keeper off the pads

A direct hit by Asif Ali. Fuller outside off, smashes it straight towards mid-off and sets off. Asif Ali positions himself, one-and-a-half stump to aim at and he nails it. Jayasuriya was not even in the frame
fuller around off, looks to smash it down the ground but doesn't middle it, long-on comes across to cut it off
fuller and wider this time, giving enough width to smash it through extra cover for four
length ball on the stumps, looks to swing it towards deep midwicket, an inside edge rolls towards the keeper off the pads
a bouncer from Wahab, Shanaka goes for the pull but fails to connect
fuller and wider outside off, goes inside out over extra cover but not enough on it to clear the fielder in dip. In fact, Fakhar takes a couple of steps forward and pouches it calmly
fuller around off, turned away towards deep square leg for a couple
fuller on the stumps, digs it out towards long-on

third run-out of the innings. Fuller outside off, drives it towards extra cover, a sliding stop by Wahab to his left, who lobs it to the left of Shadab. Not the best of the throws but Shadab grabs it with both hands and flicks it onto the stumps. Bhanuka was so short that he had given up
length ball around off, punched towards long-off
fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards extra cover
fuller outside off, works it behind point for a couple
length ball outside off, Udana backs away and lofts it over mid-off, dribbles towards the boundary
a brilliant yorker at the leg stump, Udana gets his feet out of the way and manages to get some bat on it even as he slips, a single to mid-off
short of length at the batsman, pulled towards deep square leg

short of length outside off, goes for the pull but misses. Wahab wants to review the caught-behind, saying there was some noise, Sarfaraz's expression says noway he is going to review it. Nothing on the UltraEdge
Wahab gets his man, no checking with anyone this time. He goes fuller and dead straight, Udana backs away and looks to smash it down the ground, misses and the middle stump is uprooted
fuller but down the leg side, needs to be re-bowled
fuller on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg, no one manning that area
a slower length ball down the leg side, goes for the pull but is deceived by the change of pace, the ball brushes the forearm and bonces towards the keeper
length outside off, looks to smash it down the ground, was another slower one. Shanaka gets it from the toe end of the bat. Lands well short of long-on
shouts of catch once again but fell well in front of deep midwicket, fuller on the pads and Hasaranga had chipped it aerially
short of length down the leg side and Shanaka pulls it fine to get a boundary
slower but down the leg side and that's the second wide of the over
fuller on the stumps, moves across and flicks it towards fine leg
fuller on the leg stump, looks to flick but misses, an appeal for lbw but was going down. A leg bye as the ball rolls towards square leg
a low full toss at the stumps, Hasaranga can only tap it towards mid-off
fuller and wider outside off, drives it towards deep point for a couple
fuller down the leg side, moves across and looks to scoop, just a little bit of bat and that's all is needed to beat the diving Sarfaraz. Fine leg was anyway up
served in the slot and Shanaka clears the front leg to smash it over the bowler's head for a maximum, great bat swing there
another wild swing to this length ball outside off, fails to connect though, and the batsmen look to sneak in a bye but change their mind with Shanaka diving back to make his ground
shortish and moves away outside off, Babar gets on top of it and punches crisply to point
pitched up and outside off, drilled through the line to mid-off, where Udana fumbles, allowing the ball to burst through his hands
mighty full and wide outside off, scythed to deep third man
short and seaming into the hips, skids off the pitch, keeps gathering pace and pings the thigh
pitched up and outside off, slower variation, creamed to extra-cover
dipping full-toss on middle, whisked away to mid-on
short and hits the bat hard, spliced to cover
short and seaming back in, inside-edged onto the pad, rolls away to cover
back of a length and on middle, Fakhar clears his front leg and hacks it away to the left of mid-on for the first boundary of Pakistan's chase
slower ball, finishes outside leg, tucked around the corner
back of a length and zips through outside off, Babar aims to run it down to third man, but can't touch it
short and homing in on off, Babar closes the face and leading-edges it back to the bowler

What have you done, Fakhar? This wicket hushes Lahore. Fakhar pre-meditates, jumps across off even before Rajitha delivers. He searches for a scoop, the seamer darts it outside off, the ball kisses the pad and rolls back onto the stumps. Rajitha produces the breakthrough for SL
full and shaping down the leg side for a wide
good length and seams back in, Shehzad plays around the front pad and is hit on the pad, but this seems to be heading down leg. Ultra Edge detects an inside edge as well
back of a length and outside off, punched up to cover
back of a length and speared down leg for another wide
short and on a fourth-stump line, fended back to the bowler
full and straight, tickled to short fine leg
back of a length and skids on outside off, squeezed to mid-on off the inside half

Pradeep knocks over Pakistan's best batsman! Fuller and angling into middle from over the wicket, a crease-bound Babar swings for the hills and only drags it back onto the stumps via a thick inside edge
short and outside off, lashed away to the right of deep third man. First-ball four for Pakistan's captain
short and wide, flayed on the bounce to deep third man
back of a length and bends away wide of off, too wide
short-arm jabbed away from outside off to deep midwicket
nice and full, seams away late, Sarfaraz hangs his bat away from the body and feathers it but it does not carry to the keeper
back of a length and slanting into middle, Sarfaraz scampers across for a tight single
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to extra-cover
back-of-the hand variation, slower ball, but too full on the pads, picked away behind square on the leg side for four. Neatly done by Pakistan's captain
back of a length and outside off, punched up to the covers
another slower ball, run away to backward point. A direct hit from Hasaranga could have had Shehzad
short and outside off, tapped to mid-off for one, another slower variation from Udana
nice and full on the pads, picked away behind square once again
pushed through outside off, Shehzad manufactures some swinging room and laces it to long-off
tossed on off, Sarfaraz gets underneath the length, he knows mid-on is inside the circle, extends his hands, and lofts it over the infielder
fuller and outside off again, no turn yet for Hasaranga. He gets underneath the length again and clobbers it over the bowler's head
flatter and breaks away outside off, driven to long-off off the front foot
Shehzad steps out now, but is nowhere close to the pitch, dragged wide of mid-on
looks like a slider, fizzes in, played back to the bowler
dragged down outside off, forced to sweeper cover off the back foot
stock ball from Sandakan, nudged with the spin in front of square on the leg side
floated up outside off, defended back to Sandkan
Shehzad shimmies out and drives down to long-on
flatter on the stumps, forced down to long-on
tossed up outside off, down the track and miscued to long-off
shortish and outside off, chopped straight to backward point off the back foot
looped up on middle, Shehzad ventures down the track again, gets close enough to the pitch and lofts a six down the ground

Shehzad ventures down the track again only to have his stumps rattled. Big-turning wrong'un from Hasaranga, Shehzad leaves his crease, he is nowhere close to the pitch of this ball. It dips, turns, and disturbs the furniture. Wild leg-side heave from Shehzad

Umar out. Another wrong'un from Hasaranga, fizzes back in, rushes the batsman for pace. He is late to jab his bat down. Pad first I reckon. Yes, hits the flap of the back pad in line with middle. Back-to-back golden ducks for Umar. He reviews the on-field out decision in vain
dragged down on middle, pulled to deep midwicket. Ali averts the hat-trick

Three wickets in four balls for Hasranga! He wheels away. Catch him if you can. Another wrong'un, turns back in once again, a crease-bound Sarfraz chops and misses. Timber. Game-changing over from Hasaranga
clipped off the pads through square leg
speared down leg for a wide
wrong'un, heading down leg for another wide
tossed up on middle, dead-batted away
skids on outside off, hit down to long-off
liberally tossed up on middle, played back to the bowler
attempted wrong'un, dragged down outside off and spins away further, off-side wide
short, wide, another googly rocks back and cracks a cut behind point for four
stock ball on off, pushed back to Sandakan
flighted on middle, knocked into the leg side. Pakistan go for a kamikaze single, the keeper tracks down the ball but misses the stumps. A direct hit could have had Asif
hacked down to long-on off the inside half
pushed through outside off, stabbed back to the bowler
full and spins back in, defended back to Hasaranga
short and slides on outside off, Imad goes deep in the crease and chops it away fine of backward point for four
wrong'un, short wide, cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover
fuller and wider outside off, lets it go through to the keeper
short of length outside off, punches it towards long-off
length ball on the stumps, goes back and pushes it back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, skips down the track and flicks it towards long-on
fuller outside off, smashed past the diving cover fielder but deep extra cover moves across swiftly to cut it off
fuller around off, tonked down the ground, one bounce and over the boundary line
slower in the air, length ball around middle, Imad was looking to work it on the leg side, closes the face of the bat a touch early and gets a thick outside edge towards third man
length ball outside off, punched towards deep extra cover from the back foot
fuller on the stumps and hammered over the bowler's head once more. Long-on puts in a desperate slide but cannot get to it
fuller and wider outside off this time, Imad goes aerial once again, neat connection but one-bounce to long-off
length ball on the stumps, goes back and forces it towards long-on, a bit of fumble but no damage
tossed up fuller and wider outside off and Imad has drilled it through extra cover, long-off had no chance
length ball around off, punched towards extra cover from the back foot
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards midwicket to hand back the strike to Imad
short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover
down the ground but gets too close to the pitch of the ball, pushes it towards short midwicket, the bowler does the fielding himself
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards midwicket, Sandakan once again with the chase but cannot stop the second run this time
fuller on the stumps, slogs it wide of long-on, didn't look like he timed it that well, inside half of the bat. The call is for two but it keeps racing and beats the long-on's slide
length ball on the stumps, flicked in front of square leg
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on
fuller outside off, lofts it over mid-off to take Pakistan past 100, this partnership is worth 51 in just 32 balls

fuller around off, looks to go aerial down the ground, the ball takes the outer half and but falls in the no man's land, well short of deep extra cover, Asif comes back for the second, the keeper collects the throw and whips off the bails. Asif puts in the dive to make his ground. An easy one for third umpire
fuller but way too outside off, one more to the total
a wide yorker, around sixth stump, Asif Ali moves across a bit, jams his bat but cannot connect
fuller outside off and driven firmly through covers, Hasaranga puts in full-length slide to make a brilliant stop to his right
a full toss around off, driven towards long-off where the fielder takes it too casual and ends up fumbling, the batsmen are aware to sneak in a second run
slower one down the leg side, Imad moves across to scoop but fails to get bat on it
fuller outside off, smashed towards extra cover but a brilliant stop by Shanaka, diving forward
another slower one, Imad picks it up this time and smashes between the bowler and mid-off, gets another boundary
fuller again, almost a yorker, pushes it towards the left of mid-off
a high full toss on the pads, Asif Ali, deep in the crease, though misses out on the pull, gets a leg bye to short fine leg
Imad shows his card by moving away towards the leg side early, Rajitha slips in a full toss at the batsman, pulled firmly but straight towards deep-backward square leg
length ball outside off, slower one, Imad goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
outside off but almost in the blockhole, digs it out towards long-off
length ball on the stumps, Imad moves towards the off side and helps it over short fine leg, one-bounce four
length outside off, moves across once again, goes down on one knee and swipes it past square leg for another boundary
fuller around off, Imad looks to repeat the shot but misses and is hit on the leg. An appeal for lbw and up goes the finger. Would have gone on to crashed into off and middle
yorker length outside off, Wahab looks to dig out but fails
a brilliant yorker on the leg stump, digs it out towards long-on
another yorker, this is brilliant from Pradeep. Wahab can only work it towards long-on
that's three in three, Asif Ali goes deep inside his crease, his back foot very close to the stumps but can only manage a single to long-on
misses his length this time, ends up bowling a knee-high full toss on the stumps and Wahab scoops it over short third man
a low full toss this time, bunted towards deep midwicket, Asif Ali is charging back for the second and makes with a dive
back-of-the-hand slower one this time, Wahab looks to scoop it over short fine leg, the idea is fine but fails in the execution and the keeper pedals back to take it comfortably
fuller outside off, Shadab looks to go aerial down the ground, gets it from the outer half and an easy catch to Shanaka at extra cover
a slower one at the stumps, Asif Ali moves across and scoop, just evades Rajitha's jump at short fine leg
a high full toss outside off, Asif Ali looks to pull but misses out. The square leg umpire says the height was okay but that could have gone either way
fuller around off, looks to scoop again but misses, gets a leg bye to square leg
and he has smashed it through covers for four. Fuller outside off and Amir throws everything at it, beats the man in the deep
fuller again but slower this time, drills straight to Shanaka at extra cover
a low full toss angling on to the pads, misses the flick and is hit on the pads
fuller on the stumps, driven along the ground towards long-on
a slower one, looks to smash it towards deep midwicket, but it's too full for the pull, Asif Ali misses and the off stump is pegged back
fuller around off, looks to smash it away, gets an inside edge towards fine leg, a diving stop there keeps it to one
length ball on the off stumps, Amir swings it towards deep midwicket, only a single
that's the match, and the series for Sri Lanka.. A length again, backs away and lofts it towards long-on, doesn't get the required distance and fittingly it's Hasaranga who completes an easy catch
